Text: My lord, I am presently deep within the forest.

In order to fulfill my mission in making the greatest
curry ever, I have dispatched Zeta to find the
finest potatoes.

While Zeta did suggest to just buy regular potatoes
at the market, I wouldn't allow it!

There is no way that I could ever offer my lord such
ordinary food at his table.

I will not sit by and wait while I have Zeta continue
searching. Right here... I shall hunt the finest meat!

While the boars in this forest are wild and violent,
I have heard rumors that this makes their meat
exceptionally tender!

Without fail, I shall capture the freshest meat alive
for me to cook!

As always, Delta's job is to hunt. But in this
instance, I have my reasons for not asking her.
As I said, I want to capture one alive.

For ingredients, freshness is essential, so until we can
get the finest potatoes, I wish to keep the boars
of this forest alive.

And if we can breed them, then we would no longer
have to worry about getting pork.

Delta's destructive nature disqualifies her from
helping complete this mission.

Since this mission was tasked to me, I shall work
hard to complete it!

If Zeta gets the potatoes and Delta gets the meat,
then I won’t have anything to do!
Grrroarrr!!!

It seems the boar I am hunting for can feel my
determination.

I am confident in my strength, even without having
to use weapons. All right...let's do this!
I can...do it!!! Yahhhhhh!
Grrroarrr!!!

I must masterfully catch this boar coming right at
me! I must...huh?!

In fear of my spirit, the boar slips to the side
and runs away.
Did it dodge at the last minute out of fear?!
I-I'll get it next time!

No matter how many times I try and catch that boar,
it keeps slipping away.
Even someone as patient as me has their limits.

Very well. You are the first to have ever pushed me
this far. I shall come at you with everything I've got!
Grrroarrr!!!

I see you... Coming straight for me only to dodge
again at the last minute, aren't you? That will no
longer work on me!

This time, I won't try and stop it. I shall counter
punch it in the nose—
Graaagh!!!

—or so I thought. My foot catches in a tree's root, and I
tumble through the air.

Yes. As I swim through the air, I fly straight
towards the boar.
Groar?!

I can see that the boar is confused by my unexpected
movements.

Of course, I had an elaborate plan to surprise the
boar... By no means is this a coincidence.
No! This isn't a coincidence!

Hehe, come at me and I will give you the full force
of my special punch!
Gamma Super Puuuuunch!!!

I scream the first thing that comes to my head as
I punch straight at it!

My outstretched fist pummels the boar right between
its eyes. Blunt force trauma!

...or so I thought, as the boar once again manages
to dodge me.
Th-This is the worst!

Instead of the boar, it is the trees in the forest
coming for me.

The next moment, I see fireworks...
That's all I can remember.
After that, I could hear the trees creaking.

How much time has passed? I open my eyes to see fallen
trees strewn around as if a storm has torn through them.

Then, I see the carcass of the boar pinned under a
big tree.

Heh... It seems my hidden technique of "Nature's
Suppression" drove the enemy into the forest and
trapped it beneath the tree.
Ah...my nose is bleeding.
With determination, I managed to emerge victorious.

I had hoped to capture more than one, but it's
getting dark, and the forest is unsafe at night.
Since I'm out of time, I shall settle for one boar.

I pull the boar out from under the tree by its hind legs
and throw it over my shoulders.
Then, I returned to the Shadow Garden.

"To my lord... Right now, I am high in the
mountains..." What's this letter about?

Gamma told me to give it to you. She said she is
searching for the finest potatoes.

Last night she brought home some boar, and now she's
off to find some potatoes.

She told me to find her the finest potatoes,
so I said I heard a rumor about how she could
find them secluded in some high mountains.

Then she told me, "Good job! I'll go get them on my
own!"

But I don't know whether or not they're the finest
potatoes.
Well, potatoes are a vegetable of many mysteries.
Yeah?

Sure. No one knows exactly where potatoes originated,
they just suddenly became a staple of everyone's
dinner tables. It's a mysterious vegetable, just like
a shadowbroker...

I can't believe you're talking about potatoes with
such passion...

I wonder if Gamma can find 'em and make it back
safely.
What're you saying? She'll be fine.

Heh, I guess that means you have faith in her. I'm
sure she'd jump for joy if you told her that yourself.
*huff, huff*
After several days, I have finally made it.

After such an exhausting journey, I struggle to
breathe... But considering the altitude, naturally
the air is thin.

*wheeze* Just a bit more... *wheeze* I will get those
potatoes...*huff*

I'm nearly at my limit, but my duties to my lord are
what keep me going.

Finding the finest ingredients in order to make the
finest curry... So I can be of use to my lord...!

With his faith, I have gradually taken one step
forward.
*wheeze, wheeze*... Phew. A cliff, huh...

Before I know it, the path in front of me vanishes.
All I can see see is a blue sky above me and a
sea of white clouds below.
The potatoes, where are the potatoes...

I open my eyes wide and comb every inch of
the ground. And then—
Found them...!

On a rock shelf below the cliffs' ledge, I found them!
Those tiny flowers must be wild potato flowers!
Okay...just a bit more...!

I lay down and gradually leaned my body over the edge,
extending my arm. With my fingers touching the sky,
I can almost reach...

I have come this far...! *huff* There's no way I'm
quitting now...!

Sand sprinkles down. But leaning just a bit further,
I manage to grab the stem of the potatoes.

I got them! Now I just got to pull them from out
of the ground and—

For a moment, it is as if the world is turning over.
I feel as if my back has gotten lighter.

Oh, my. I'm falling. But, there's no way I'm letting
go of these potatoes.
I did iiiit—!!!
